name: Elden Ring in 24 Hours
description:
Welcome to Scuffed Souls: "Elden Ring"

This is what Elden Ring might have been like it if were created in only 24 hours*.

*Makes more sense if you watch the making of video

Features:
  • Character creator
  • "Limgrave" to explore
  • a "Tree Sentinel" to fight
Controls:

Supports Keyboard and Controller.
